DescriptionData.Title: Lace Edged Zip 20cm - Acid Green
DescriptionData.Description:
These close ended lace edged zips are perfect when a plain zip just will not do, they add an extra level of detail to any outfit or project. The zip is 20cm long and the zipper has a smooth ball design in a dark metal.
We offer a range of these nylon zips in 24 colours to buy from our online fabric and haberdashery shop.

DescriptionData.Title: Love To Sew Rounded Sewing Basket
DescriptionData.Description:
A very pretty large rounded sewing chest giving you room for plenty of sewing accessories and it is all upholstered in come gorgeous quality quilting cotton form the Love To Sew collection from Michael Miller.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!
Size Width 31cm Depth 22cm Height 20cm

DescriptionData.Title: 100m Gutermann Sew-all Thread 972
DescriptionData.Description:
Buy 3 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size (any colour) and save 5%!

Buy 10 Gutterman Sew-all threads of the same size  (any colour) and save 10%!

Discount applied in your basket


Gutermann Sew-all thread is the most reliable of machine threads. It may be used on natural, blended and synthetic fabrics which makes it extremely versatile.

DescriptionData.Title: Madeira Thread Snips
DescriptionData.Description:
Madeira 4 Snips with automatic spring back & thumb grip
Ideal for unpicking stitches, trimming loose threads and seam allowances
Suitable for left and right handed use

DescriptionData.Title: Fray Stoppa 50ml
DescriptionData.Description: Fray stoppa eliminates fraying of fabric on hems and seams. 50ml, 1.70 fl.oz.

DescriptionData.Title: 2 Pack Of Lace Trim Each 2m On Wooden Spindle
DescriptionData.Description: 2 spools of decorative lace ribbon supplied in a 2m length and wound onto an attractive wooden spindle. The great thing is that when you have used the trim you will still have the spindles that you can re-use after! 3 spindles sold as a set.

DescriptionData.Title: ODIF 505 Temporary Adhesive Spray 250ml
DescriptionData.Description:
ODIF 505 Temporary Adhesive Spray 250ml
Temprary fabric adhesive. Odorless Colourless Stainless Spotless Does not gum needles No CFC
Please note that special postage prices may apply within certain postcode areas of the UK. We are also unable to send this product outside of the UK due to carrier restricitons on aerosols.
If your postcode is in either of the two lists below then you will need to select the appropriate additional postage charge:
Zone C AB 31 to AB 38 AB 40 to AB 56 IV 1 to 28 IV 30 to 32 IV 36 & 40 IV 52 to 54 IV63 KW 1 to 14 PA 21 to PA 38 PH 4 to PH 41 PH 49, PH 50 Northern Ireland (BT)
Zone D HS IV 41 to 49 IV 51, 55 & 56 KA 27 & 28 KW 15 to17 PA 20 PA 41 to 49 PA 60 to 78 PH 42 to 44 ZE Isle of Man (IM) Channel Islands
